name: CMYKOUR
description:
CMYKOUR (Pronounced "C-M-Y-core" )

A first person runner, where the player uses different colored lenses to filter light using subtractive color blending, altering which platforms are available to them at a given moment.

BE ADVISED, THIS GAME HAS BRIGHT FLASHING COLORS.

How to Play:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look

LMB/RMB - Cycle lens colors

R - Restart

ESC - Quit
